remarks: Property of a nonzero functional with a closed kernel.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Feb-2015.)
statement:
lcfl8b.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcfl8b.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcfl8b.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcfl8b.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
lcfl8b.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` U ) $.
lcfl8b.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
lcfl8b.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` U ) $.
lcfl8b.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
lcfl8b.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` U ) $.
lcfl8b.y $e |- Y = ( 0g ` D ) $.
lcfl8b.c $e |- C = { f e. F | ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` ( L ` f ) ) ) = ( L ` f ) } $.
lcfl8b.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcfl8b.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( C \ { Y } ) ) $.
lcfl8b $p |- ( ph -> E. x e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ( ._|_ ` ( L ` G ) ) = ( N ` { x } ) ) $.
$d ._|_ f x $.
$d C x $.
$d F f $.
$d G f x $.
$d L f x $.
$d U x $.
$d V x $.
$d ph x $.
